resources.string:
LibreTorrent is a Free as in Freedom torrent client for Android 4+, based on libtorrent (Java wrapper frostwire-jlibtorrent https://github.com/frostwire/frostwire-jlibtorrent ) lib.

LibreTorrent is free software, released under the terms of the GNU General Public License v3 (GPLv3)
http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html
More information and also to help the project: https://gitlab.com/proninyaroslav/libretorrent
The app error occurred. You can send the report to developers
Fetching data from magnet link. Please wait…
Delete the selected torrent? This operation cannot be undone
Delete the selected torrents? This operation cannot be undone
Enter the infohash value, magnet link, or HTTP/HTTPS link
You can add extra information and comments here:
Failed decoding torrent file. Maybe the file is corrupted or has an incorrect format
Unable to create a new folder
Failed to fetch data from the link
Failed to add the torrent. Maybe the torrent file is moved, or deleted
There is not enough free space on the selected path to download the selected files
Invalid link or path to the torrent
Unable to add the torrent. I/O error
Unable to open the torrent file
Unable to use selected folder to download. Please select another folder
Failed to save a torrent file
Enter the words (separated by \"|\"), one of which must be in the name or enter regular expression. Torrents will be added only if this filter matches the torrent name
Selected file or folder not found
Selected folder is empty or all files are excluded by filter
Selected folder to save not found
Failed to add IP filter. Maybe file is corrupted or has an incorrect format
This torrent has not connected to any peers yet
Without this permission app can\'t save torrent files in memory. The app will not work properly. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
The torrent may be resumed or paused automatically at any point. Enabling this option may slow down the pause/resume
Run the app after start device
All torrents will be paused if the battery level goes below %1$d%%. Limit doesn\'t apply at the time of charging
Enabling this will increase the battery usage. Use this option if the download speed reduces when screen turns off
Setting a custom battery percentage for the application to watch for will have a negative impact on battery life while downloads are occurring. Are you sure you want to enable this?
Set a custom percentage to pause downloads at if the battery drops below the given threshold. Enabling this will ignore the default %1$d%% threshold
If enabled, torrents will download/upload only when charging. All torrents will pause when not connected to charger
Download and upload only when charging
It allows BitTorrent-clients to find each other without the use of tracker
Using IP filtering increases memory usage. Depending on the file size, the filter may take some time to be applied at startup
It\'s designed to support the discovery of local BitTorrent peers, aiming to minimize the traffic
Shutdown app at the specified time
Start app at the specified time. Torrents will run according to their state before the last shutdown
It\'s intended to mitigate poor latency and other congestion control issues found in conventional BitTorrent over TCP, while providing reliable, ordered delivery
Periodically refresh channels in the background
Disable connections not supported by proxies
If enabled, the application will remain running in the background. Shutdown when downloads complete is still respected
Maximum number of connections per torrent
Maximum number of upload slots per torrent
The proxy will be used for connecting with trackers, peers and web seeds
Warning: the password is saved unencrypted
Wi-Fi is automatically enabled when app is launched at the scheduled time and is disabled after app is shutdown at the scheduled time
If enabled, the app will shutdown when all downloads have completed
Show a notification when a torrent finishes downloading
The torrent files (with .torrent extension) are watched in the specified directory and automatically added. The torrent files are deleted after adding
Download and upload only if Wi-Fi is connected
Proxy server settings will be applied after restarting the app
unable to restore torrent from previous session
Select or add an RSS/Atom channel
Settings will be applied after restarting the app
Set speed in KiB/s (0 - without limit)
Theme settings will be applied after restarting the app
Torrent already exists. Torrents were merged
